des: Patrick Bailey grounds out, shortstop Ehire Adrianza to first baseman Brandon Drury.
Thairo Estrada grounds out, shortstop Ehire Adrianza to first baseman Brandon Drury.   Luis Matos to 3rd.
Jorge Soler doubles (1) on a fly ball to right fielder Tucker Flint.
Michael Conforto grounds out, third baseman Arol Vera to first baseman Brandon Drury.
Matt Chapman flies out to right fielder Aaron Hicks.
Garrett Cooper grounds into a force out, shortstop Zach Neto to second baseman Luis Rengifo.   Luis Vazquez out at 2nd.
Mike Tauchman out on a sacrifice fly to center fielder Mike Trout.   Matt Shaw scores.
Luis Vazquez singles on a ground ball to center fielder Mike Trout, deflected by second baseman Luis Rengifo.   Matt Shaw to 3rd.
